price: To, in dai ka kãma su a cikin yãƙi, sai ka kõre* waɗanda suke a bãyansu, game da su, tsammãninsu, zã su dinga tunãwa.
arabic: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
footnotes: * Wãtau a kashe waɗanda aka kãma dõmin saura su gani su ji tsõro.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
